title: Band wagon
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, Ford Motor Company, James Carr and Peter Hopkinson
brief_description: Features the music and members of the Cy Laurie Jazz Band as they journey through London in a Ford Thames 12 seater van to illustrate the main characteristics and performance of the van.
